Has not the Lord given light to His people upon this subject? Have you not had a testimony to bear on this point? Why has this matter been left for the very last? It should have been the very first work done on the school grounds. This would have revealed an altogether different aspect of the work, and would have met the approval of God.--Letter 56, 1897. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. June 7, 1984
